name: Cuberat Adventure
description:
Cubera Adventure -
is a short game, the passage of which will take from 30 minutes to an hour.
The gameplay
of the game is constantly changing.
You will find yourself in unusual situations and explore new opportunities to move on.
Solve puzzles, experience the reaction and avoid traps under the commentator's jokes.
A simple design and commentator will take you on a short but exciting journey.
